session_summary: At 1:43 pm on 14 September 2022, Joanna and Nate caught up, where Joanna shared her laptop crash frustration and Nate recommended backups. Nate shared his experience teaching vegan ice cream recipes on a cooking show. They discussed dairy-free desserts, with Joanna sharing a chocolate raspberry tart recipe and Nate favoring coconut milk ice cream. Joanna also mentioned a dairy-free chocolate cake and a blueberry dessert. They ended their chat on a friendly note, with Joanna offering to share more recipes and Nate expressing gratitude.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Hey Nate, long time no see! My laptop crashed last week and I lost all my work - super frustrating! As a writer, my laptop is like half of my lifeline so losing all progress was like a major blow.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Hey Joanna, sorry to hear about that. Losing so much progress must be really frustrating. Did you manage to recover anything? Maybe consider backing up your work in the future?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Thanks for the sympathy, Nate. Nothing was recoverable, but now I have an external drive for backups. I never want to go through this again. So, how have you been? Making anything cool?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Hey Joanna, I'm no writer like you, but something pretty awesome happened. Last Monday I got to teach people vegan ice cream recipes on my own cooking show! It was a bit nerve-wracking to put myself out there, but it was a blast. Plus, I picked up a few new recipes!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Way to go, Nate! Congrats on the cooking show, I'll definitely be tuning in! What's your favorite dish from the show?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of a bowl of ice cream with a spoon on a table
conversation_turns.text: Coconut milk ice cream is at the top of my list. It's so smooth and creamy with a tropical coconut twist. Plus, it's dairy-free for people who can't have lactose or who want vegan options. Here's a snap of the ice cream I made.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that looks amazing, Nate! I love the color and texture. It's great that you're making these options. Could you share the recipe? I'd love to try making it sometime!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Yeah sure! Would love to share it. Let's spread the joy of dairy-free options! Let me know when you make it!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Cool, Nate! Gonna give it a go. Dairy-free is a must for me, especially for desserts. Last Friday, I made a deeeelish dessert with almond milk - it was good! Got any favs when it comes to dairy-free desserts?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Coconut milk ice cream is one of my favorites as you might be able to tell, but I also love a dairy-free chocolate mousse. It's super creamy and tastes like the real thing. What's been your favorite dairy-free sweet treat so far?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a chocolate tart with raspberries on top
conversation_turns.query: chocolate raspberry tart almond flour crust ganache fresh raspberries
conversation_turns.text: Hey Nate, my favorite dairy-free treat is this amazing chocolate raspberry tart. It has an almond flour crust, chocolate ganache, and fresh raspberries - it's delicious!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a piece of chocolate cake with raspberries on a plate
conversation_turns.text: That looks amazing, Joanna! I need to try baking that. What other treats do you like making?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a piece of chocolate cake with raspberries on a plate
conversation_turns.text: Hey Nate, I love making this dairy-free chocolate cake with raspberries. It's so moist and delicious - perfect sweetness level.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: That cake looks amazing, Joanna! How did you make it?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: I make it with almond flour, coconut oil, chocolate and raspberries. It's my favorite for birthdays and special days.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Yum, Joanna! Gotta try that one. Any others you want to share?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a piece of cake with walnuts on top
conversation_turns.text: Hey Nate! Here's another recipe I like. It's a delicious dessert made with blueberries, coconut milk, and a gluten-free crust. So creamy and delicious!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Wow, Joanna! That dessert looks amazing. I'll definitely have to give it a try. Thanks!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Glad to help, Nate. Let me know if you try it. I'm sure you'll enjoy it. It was great chatting.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Thanks Joanna! I will. Bye!

Joanna: Joanna loses her work after her laptop crashes.
Nate: Nate hosts a cooking show to teach people how to make vegan ice cream using coconut milk.

Joanna: Joanna's laptop crashed last week, causing her to lose all her work which was a major blow.
Joanna now uses an external drive for backups to prevent losing work again.
Joanna made a delicious dessert with almond milk last Friday.
Joanna's favorite dairy-free sweet treat is a chocolate raspberry tart with almond flour crust, chocolate ganache, and fresh raspberries.
Joanna loves making dairy-free chocolate cake with raspberries for special occasions, using almond flour, coconut oil, chocolate, and raspberries.
Joanna enjoys making a dessert with blueberries, coconut milk, and a gluten-free crust, finding it creamy and delicious.
Nate: Nate recently taught vegan ice cream recipes on his cooking show and learned some new recipes.
Nate's favorite dish from his cooking show is coconut milk ice cream for its smooth, creamy, and dairy-free qualities.
Nate also loves dairy-free chocolate mousse as it is super creamy and tastes like the real thing.
Nate is interested in trying Joanna's dairy-free chocolate cake with raspberries and other recipes she likes making.
Nate expresses interest in Joanna's dairy-free dessert with blueberries, coconut milk, and a gluten-free crust mentioning it looks amazing.
